name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John MONELLI, Appellant

judges: Ronald J. Wydo, Wilkes-Barre, court-appointed, for appellant.
Chester B. Muroski, Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John MONELLI, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
446 A.2d 604
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John MONELLI, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 13, 1982.
Decided June 25, 1982.
Ronald J. Wydo, Wilkes-Barre, court-appointed, for appellant.
Chester B. Muroski, Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
